attributes.action: Stop Local Councils giving 3-4 bedroom houses to single parents with only one child. And  coupled OAP to move to smaller accomodation to free the houses up for big familys
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It has been Noticed through out the local councils that they insist on making big familys with 3-4 children to live in a two bedroomed property and let 3 children share one bedroom, with a living room and toilet and kitchen. 
But there is a deal for one parent mothers or fathers and OAP`S that have no children or have one child are being housed in 3-4 bedroomed properties that are hardly lived in.

Im asking the goverment to make it compulsory that single parents and OAP`S or single people with any medical conditions. To be housed in flats or 1 bedroom bungalows and free the houses up for larger families that require the space. Make it compulsory for coupled OAPS to give up there 3-4 bedroomed houses for a smaller property provided by the local council.
